entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has come to warn Harry Potter. He is described as being small and fragile, with eight hats on his head.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the person that Dobby has come to warn. He is described as having experience of Dobby's habits of self-punishment.

entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: House-elves are a group of elves that serve the wizarding families. They are mentioned as being warned not to tell Harry Potter about Dobby's warning.

relationships.description: Dobby has come to warn Harry Potter, as mentioned in the text: 'Dobby has come to warn you...'
House-elves have been warned not to tell Harry Potter about Dobby's warning, as mentioned in the text: 'but the house-elves have been warn ed not to tell...'
